Trade/Device Name(s): Q.STEPS Biometer G/C Dual Monitoring System
Q.STEPSim Biometer G/C Dual Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Q.STEPS Biometer G/C Dual Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose and cholesterol in whole blood using enzymatic electrochemical biosensor technology
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use by healthcare professionals and home users for quantitative measurement of glucose and cholesterol in whole blood from fingertips to aid in the management of carbohydrate metabolism disorders and disorders involving excess cholesterol or lipid metabolism.
